mapper.select: select d.number,d.state,f.name as 'first_location', s.name as 'second_location', d.detect_man, d.start_time from tb_Detect d, tb_FirstAddr f, tb_SecondAddr s where d.first_addr=f.first_no and d.second_addr=s.second_no and d.state=1

select d.number,d.state,f.name as 'first_location', s.name as 'second_location', d.detect_man, d.start_time from tb_Detect d, tb_FirstAddr f, tb_SecondAddr s where d.first_addr=f.first_no and d.second_addr=s.second_no and d.state=0
mapper.update: update tb_Detect set state=#{state} where number=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_DetectDevices(device_class, detect_id, normal, repairing, broken, mark) values(#{detectDevice.deviceClass},#{detectId},#{detectDevice.normal},#{detectDevice.repairing},#{detectDevice.broken},#{detectDevice.mark})
mapper.update: update tb_Detect set state=2 where number=#{detectId}
